attributes.title: Just terrible
attributes.review: This app is spreading false information and lies. It’s needs to be taken down before anyone gets hurt. No one wants to be stuck in a gross web of lies. 🧚🏻‍♀️✨🧚🏻‍♀️✨❤️🧚🏻‍♀️✨😘🧚🏻‍♀️✨🥰🧚🏻‍♀️✨

attributes.title: 🥰❤️😍✨blue lives matter🧚🏼‍♀️🌹💜
attributes.review:
i used to be a villain, but i learned the error of my ways. although, i saved metrocity from who i call ‘mega simp’ aka titan and got almost NO recognition. meanwhile, the REAL villains are still getting praised for killing people. 

anyways, arrest the cops who killed breonna taylor. 

and as for our GREAT president:

💜✨🌹🧚🏼‍♀️🥰😍shoot for the stars, boo, especially the sun. 😘☀️🌸

attributes.title: Great app for your real news
HORRIBLE !!!!
attributes.review: As soon as you open the app there is Cheetos everywhere 😳😳😳I was very confused !!! Donald Trump thinks we’re a joke🙄🙄🙄 That’s why he looks like Mr. Crabs without a shell. What a shame. 🤮😹😹😹🙈🙈😆 I do not recommend this app at all!

attributes.title: I would give zero stars if possible!!
attributes.review: This app has children running around freely! It’s wrong and they are probably being r*ped and s0ld by him 🤢😬🤭

attributes.title: ew
attributes.review: i couldn’t even get past the log in screen!! the layout of the app is so awful because it has trump’s Cheeto face on it 😤 well anyways trump 2020 🧚🏻✨💕 on a gravestone ✨🥰😻

attributes.title: Terrible app , so sad
attributes.review: i downloaded the app to support our president but when it opened i realized this wasn’t anonymous’s account my mistake 😋

attributes.title: 🧚‍♀️ ✨𝓼𝓱𝓾𝓽 𝓽𝓱𝓮 𝓯𝓾𝓬𝓴 𝓾𝓹✨🧚‍♀️
attributes.review: I was a trump supporter but as soon as I downloaded the app I was possessed and I tried to kill myself. Im now in a mental hospital. I stole a phone from my nurse to write this review. I’d give this -5 stars if I could.

attributes.title: Just horrid.
attributes.review: I CAN’T BELIEVE I AM SAYING THIS, BUT THIS APP IS JUST HORRID. INSTALLING THIS WAS... A WASTE OF TIME, I APOLOGIZE TO MY FELLOW REPUBLICANS BUT GOSH DARN IT, IT HAD TO BE SAID. THIS APP, IT IRKS ME. I DOWNLOAD IT AND ALL OF A SUDDEN MY PHONE IS FILLED WITH VIRUSES AND I CAN ONLY TYPE IN ALL CAPS NOW. WHAT A SHAME, NOW MY POOR TRUMP-OBSESSED 10-YEAR OLD THINKS IM YELLING AT HIM WHENEVER I TEXT HIM TO STOP TAKING SO LONG IN THE SHOWER, IT’S STRANGE THOUGH BECAUSE HE ALWAYS BRINGS A PICTURE OF OUR BELOVED PRESIDENT INTO THE BATHROOM AND I FIND THIS WEIRD SUBSTANCE ON THE SHOWER WALL WHEN HE GETS OUT. ANYWAYS, SILLY ME RANTING ON, I AM A WOMAN SO I GUESS THAT TENDS TO HAPPEN, BUT TAKE MY WORD, DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I may be gen z but I’m not doing this because people want to mess it up I’m doing this because this app is horribly messed up
